name: Flare Up (ret724)
description:
A top down shooter where you have a flare gun and are trying to kill the enemies to get a new high score. you start off with one ammo. when you run out of ammo either a red or blue ammo crate spawns, red gives 1 ammo, blue give 3. Left click to shoot normally, Right click to lower temperature. In the bottom right is the ammo indicator blue means 3 ammo, green means 2 ammo, red means 1 ammo, gray means no ammo.

Coding/Artwork made by: ret724

Music made by: That Musical Sparrow Song

Sound effects made with: jsfxr
